birth_place.zh-cn: 英格兰伦敦圣詹姆斯宫

description.zh-cn: 英国斯图亚特王朝女王。在其父詹姆斯二世因光荣革命被废黜后，她与丈夫兼表兄威廉三世于1689年共同即位，成为英格兰、苏格兰和爱尔兰的女王。统治期间，她签署了限制王权的《权利法案》。当威廉在海外参与军事战役时，她独立执政，展现出强大果决的统治能力。
description.en: Queen of England, Scotland, and Ireland from the House of Stuart. Following the deposition of her father, James II, in the Glorious Revolution, she and her husband and cousin, William III, ascended the throne jointly in 1689. During her reign, she signed the Bill of Rights, which limited royal power. When William was engaged in military campaigns abroad, she governed alone, proving to be a strong and decisive ruler.

description.zh-cn: 奥兰治亲王，通过与妻子玛丽二世的婚姻，在1688年光荣革命后成为英格兰、苏格兰及爱尔兰国王。他领导了反法的大同盟战争。
description.en: Prince of Orange who, through his marriage to Mary II, became King of England, Scotland, and Ireland after the Glorious Revolution of 1688. He led the Grand Alliance against France.

description.zh-cn: 玛丽二世的父亲，英格兰、苏格兰和爱尔兰国王。由于其天主教信仰和亲法政策，他在1688年的光荣革命中被废黜并流亡法国。
description.en: Father of Mary II, and King of England, Scotland, and Ireland. Due to his Catholic faith and pro-French policies, he was deposed in the Glorious Revolution of 1688 and exiled to France.

description.zh-cn: 约克公爵詹姆斯（后来的詹姆斯二世）的第一任妻子，玛丽二世和安妮女王的母亲。
description.en: The first wife of James, Duke of York (later James II), and the mother of Queen Mary II and Queen Anne.

description.zh-cn: 1688年发生于英格兰的一场政变，导致信奉天主教的国王詹姆斯二世被废黜，其信奉新教的女儿玛丽二世和女婿威廉三世共同登基。
description.en: A coup that took place in England in 1688, leading to the deposition of the Catholic King James II and the accession of his Protestant daughter Mary II and her husband William III.

description.zh-cn: 由英格兰议会通过的宪法性文件，确立了威廉三世和玛丽二世的共治地位，限制了王权，并规定了王位继承顺序。
description.en: A constitutional document passed by the Parliament of England that established the joint rule of William III and Mary II, limited the powers of the monarchy, and set out the line of succession to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 七位英格兰权贵的团体，他们在1688年6月30日致信邀请奥兰治的威廉入侵英格兰，以推翻詹姆斯二世的统治。
description.en: A group of seven prominent English nobles who sent a letter on June 30, 1688, inviting William of Orange to invade England and overthrow the rule of James II.

nodes.id: 第一代马尔博罗公爵约翰·丘吉尔

zh-cn: 第一代马尔博罗公爵约翰·丘吉尔

description.zh-cn: 英国军事家和政治家。他在光荣革命中从詹姆斯二世倒戈支持威廉三世，但后来因涉嫌支持詹姆斯二世的复辟计划而被玛丽二世撤职并短暂监禁。
description.en: An English soldier and statesman. He defected from James II to support William III during the Glorious Revolution, but was later dismissed and briefly imprisoned by Mary II on suspicion of plotting to restore James II.

description.zh-cn: 玛丽二世的妹妹，在威廉三世去世后继承王位。因约翰·丘吉尔夫妇的问题与姐姐玛丽关系破裂。
description.en: The younger sister of Mary II, who succeeded William III to the throne. Her relationship with her sister Mary broke down over issues concerning John Churchill and his wife.

description.zh-cn: 约翰·丘吉尔的妻子，安妮女王的密友和强有力的支持者。她对安妮的影响是导致玛丽与安妮姐妹关系破裂的关键因素。
description.en: Wife of John Churchill and a close friend and powerful supporter of Queen Anne. Her influence over Anne was a key factor in the breakdown of the relationship between the sisters Mary and Anne.

description.zh-cn: 一个统治苏格兰、英格兰和爱尔兰的欧洲王室。
description.en: A European royal house that ruled Scotland, England, and Ireland.

description.zh-cn: 英格兰王国的立法机构。在光荣革命后，它宣布威廉和玛丽为共治君主。
description.en: The legislature of the Kingdom of England. After the Glorious Revolution, it declared William and Mary joint sovereigns.

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰王国的立法机构。它承认威廉和玛丽为苏格兰的共治君主。
description.en: The legislature of the Kingdom of Scotland. It recognized William and Mary as joint sovereigns of Scotland.

description.zh-cn: 支持被废黜的国王詹姆斯二世及其后代复辟英国王位的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement dedicated to the restoration of the deposed King James II and his descendants to the thrones of Great Britain.

nodes.id: 第一代邓迪子爵约翰·格雷厄姆

zh-cn: 第一代邓迪子爵约翰·格雷厄姆

description.zh-cn: 詹姆斯二世的忠实支持者，在苏格兰高地领导了詹姆斯党叛乱。
description.en: A loyal supporter of James II who led the Jacobite rising in the Scottish Highlands.

description.zh-cn: 詹姆斯党在苏格兰高地取得胜利的一场战役，但其领导人邓迪子爵在此战中阵亡。
description.en: A battle in the Scottish Highlands where the Jacobites were victorious, but their leader, Viscount Dundee, was killed.

description.zh-cn: 在此次战役中，威廉三世的军队击败了在基利克兰基之战后群龙无首的詹姆斯党叛军。
description.en: In this battle, William III's forces defeated the leaderless Jacobite rebels following the Battle of Killiecrankie.

description.zh-cn: 位于伦敦的皇家宫殿，是玛丽二世的出生地。
description.en: A royal palace in London, and the birthplace of Mary II.

description.zh-cn: 位于北美维吉尼亚州的一所大学，其皇家宪章由玛丽二世于1693年颁发。
description.en: A university in Virginia, North America, which received its royal charter from Queen Mary II in 1693.

description.zh-cn: 光荣革命导致玛丽二世的父亲詹姆斯二世被废黜，为玛丽与丈夫威廉共同登上王位铺平了道路。
description.en: The Glorious Revolution led to the deposition of Mary II's father, James II, paving the way for Mary and her husband William to jointly ascend the throne.

description.zh-cn: 该法案将王位授予玛丽与威廉，正式确立了她们的共治君主地位。
description.en: This act offered the throne to Mary and William, formally establishing them as joint sovereigns.

relationships.target: 第一代马尔博罗公爵约翰·丘吉尔

description.zh-cn: 玛丽二世因怀疑约翰·丘吉尔参与复辟其父詹姆斯二世的计划，下令撤销其职务并将其逮捕。
description.en: Mary II ordered the dismissal and arrest of John Churchill on suspicion of his involvement in a plot to restore her father, James II.

description.zh-cn: 因处理约翰·丘吉尔及其夫人萨拉·邱吉尔一事，玛丽与深受萨拉影响的妹妹安妮关系破裂，此后姐妹俩再未见面。
description.en: Due to her handling of John Churchill and his wife Sarah, Mary's relationship with her sister Anne, who was heavily influenced by Sarah, broke down. The sisters never met again.

description.zh-cn: 玛丽二世颁发皇家宪章，创立了威廉与玛丽学院。
description.en: Mary II granted a royal charter to found the College of William & Mary.

description.zh-cn: 在光荣革命期间，詹姆斯二世众叛亲离，最终被迫逃亡法国，失去了王位。
description.en: During the Glorious Revolution, James II lost his support and was ultimately forced to flee to France, losing his throne.

description.zh-cn: 应“不朽七人”的邀请，威廉三世率领军队登陆英格兰，发动了光荣革命。
description.en: At the invitation of the 'Immortal Seven', William III led an army to land in England, initiating the Glorious Revolution.

description.zh-cn: “不朽七人”致信邀请威廉三世和玛丽带兵前来英格兰，推翻詹姆斯二世。
description.en: The 'Immortal Seven' sent a letter inviting William III and Mary to bring an army to England to overthrow James II.

description.zh-cn: 英格兰议会宣布詹姆斯二世自动退位，王位由玛丽与威廉共同继承。
description.en: The Parliament of England declared that James II had abdicated and that the throne was jointly inherited by Mary and William.

description.zh-cn: 苏格兰王国议会宣布詹姆斯不再是苏格兰国王，并承认威廉和玛丽为共治君主。
description.en: The Parliament of Scotland declared that James was no longer King of Scotland and recognized William and Mary as joint sovereigns.

relationships.source: 第一代马尔博罗公爵约翰·丘吉尔

description.zh-cn: 在光荣革命期间，时任詹姆斯二世军队主帅的约翰·丘吉尔倒戈投向威廉。
description.en: During the Glorious Revolution, John Churchill, then commander of James II's army, defected to William's side.

description.zh-cn: 安妮深受其密友萨拉·邱吉尔的影响，并强烈支持她和她的丈夫。
description.en: Anne was heavily influenced by her close friend Sarah Churchill and was a strong supporter of her and her husband.

relationships.source: 第一代邓迪子爵约翰·格雷厄姆

description.zh-cn: 邓迪子爵在苏格兰高地起兵，领导了詹姆斯党的叛乱。
description.en: Viscount Dundee raised an army in the Scottish Highlands, leading the Jacobite rebellion.

relationships.target: 第一代邓迪子爵约翰·格雷厄姆

description.zh-cn: 尽管詹姆斯党赢得了基利克兰基之战，但其领导人邓迪子爵在战役一开始就受了致命伤并阵亡。
description.en: Although the Jacobites won the Battle of Killiecrankie, their leader, Viscount Dundee, was mortally wounded at the beginning of the battle and died.

description.zh-cn: 在邓凯尔德战役中，詹姆斯党叛军被威廉的部队击溃。
description.en: In the Battle of Dunkeld, the Jacobite rebels were defeated by William's forces.
